title: Optimizing Electrical Cable Design: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Utilization of team collaboration tools (bulletin board/chat) in a smartphone-based LMS environment, with weekly live Q&A sessions

learning_goals: Derive cable design solutions that meet specified engineering requirements (insulator utilization rate, maximum load current, minimum outer diameter).
Explain a design process applying core engineering principles, including insulation coordination, current capacity, and cable loss calculations.
Apply cost-efficiency analysis and power loss minimization criteria when selecting materials and optimizing designs.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
